item.title: BO - Catalog- Files - CRUD
item.description: BO - Catalog- Files - CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Files Files page is displayed Title contains ‘Files’ Click on “Create New File” Title contains ‘Add new file’ Set these fields: - File name - Description - File Message “Successful creation.” is displayed The list of files is updated. Click on the 3-dot button > View file File should be downloaded

item.title: BO - Catalog- Files - Bulk Actions
item.description: BO - Catalog- Files - Bulk Actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Files page Title contains ‘Files’ Select 1 file > Click Bulk actions > Delete selected > Delete Green alert “The selection has been successfully deleted” id displayed Select 2 files > Click Bulk actions > Delete selected > Delete Green alert “The selection has been successfully deleted” id displayed Select all files > Click Bulk actions > Delete selected > Delete Green alert “The selection has been successfully deleted” is displayed

item.title: BO - Catalog- Files - Filter, Pagination and Sort
item.description: BO - Catalog- Files - Filter, Pagination and Sort Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Files page The files page is well displayed Filter By ID Number files < Total Files and the list contains the searched ID Reset Filter Number files = Total files Filter by Name Number files < Total files and the list contains the searched name Reset Filter Number files = Total files Filter by Size

item.title: BO - Catalog- Files - Help button
item.description: BO - Catalog- Files - Help button Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Files page The Files page is well displayed Click on Help The documentation modal is opened in English Close the modal The modal is well closed
